Module com.example.petcarecab302qu
Package com.example.petcarecab302qu.model.interfaces

Interface IScheduleDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockScheduleDAO, SqliteScheduleDAO
public interface IScheduleDAO
Interface for the Schedules Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the Schedule class with the database.
